1. Please ensure that you are selecting *Microsoft [Application]* and *not* ~Microsoft [Application] Online~. 

 2. You could also check that the person sharing a file/folder with you had given you the correct permissions to view/edit/download/upload. See <https://support.box.com/hc/en-us/categories/360003200713-Collaborating| Collaborating> in Box :wrench:

You can merge your box accounts following these instructions:

1. Login to your preferred Box account

2. Go to your *Account Settings*.

3. In the *Login and Email Addresses* section click the *Add Email* button and enter your other Box account email

4. This should merge permissions for both accounts.
 _If you encounter an error I would suggest contacting Box support_ :wrench:
